data.name: Filthy, Stinking, Orcs! Demo
data.detailed_description: Filthy, Stinking, Orcs! is a VR tower defense game set in a fantasy world besieged by monsters. Plan your strategy and join in the action by taking control of the weapons of war with your own hands! Defend your citadel and villages in beaches, plains, swamps, and mountains across 16 levels. Fight orcs, goblins, ogres, and dragons! Fire bows, crossbows, cannons, machine guns and more!
data.about_the_game: Filthy, Stinking, Orcs! is a VR tower defense game set in a fantasy world besieged by monsters. Plan your strategy and join in the action by taking control of the weapons of war with your own hands! Defend your citadel and villages in beaches, plains, swamps, and mountains across 16 levels. Fight orcs, goblins, ogres, and dragons! Fire bows, crossbows, cannons, machine guns and more!
data.short_description: 1 level, 9 waves. Can you save your citadel? Place towers and man the weapons in this tower defense VR game to defend against a horde of Filthy, Stinking, Orcs!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
